headline: Does AXP’s Younger Premium Cardholders and Product Momentum Change The Bull Case For American Express?
summary: In recent days, American Express has been highlighted for its strong multi‑year revenue and earnings per share growth, expanding premium card benefits, and award‑winning products, while analysts and insiders show mixed sentiment toward the stock. The combination of double‑digit historical growth, growing traction with younger affluent customers, and continued product innovation suggests American Express’s premium‑focused model is resonating across generations and geographies. We’ll now...

headline: Why Saks Fifth Avenue could face Chapter 11 or liquidation
summary: Having spent two years running a very large toy store, I learned a few things about dealing with vendors. Some vendors offered terms tailored to the fact that our business was heavily weighted to the fourth quarter. Many offered merchandise all year that we had to pay for after the Christmas ...
